name: Papa v. Pittsburgh Penn-Center Corporation, Appellant

judges: Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
parties: Papa v. Pittsburgh Penn-Center Corporation, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the opinion of Judge David Olbum, of the Court of Common Pleas of Allegheny County, reported in 38 Pa. D. & C. 2d 756.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: William, O. Walker, with him Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, for appellant.
James E. Beasley, with him Behrend, Phillips and Hudson, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Papa v. Pittsburgh Penn-Center Corporation, Appellant.
Argued March 18, 1966.
Before Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen and O’Brien, JJ.
William, O. Walker, with him Dickie, McCamey & Chilcote, for appellant.
James E. Beasley, with him Behrend, Phillips and Hudson, for appellees.
April 19, 1966:
